text: - We are a financial institution.

We are processing around
30,000 calls per day,
supported on 1500 engagement centers.

We are working with a
solution provided by AWS
called Post Call Analytics.

It's an open source framework
that we are using right now,

pulling data from customer
voice interactions,
transcribing all that information.
Before Post Call Analytics,

we didn't have all the insights
that we are now able to get.

We didn't have a chance
to act more proactively.

What's called analytics
now, it's infusing bedrock.
And now with GenAI,

we are able to summarize
the customer interaction.
We are able to identify topics,
we are able to identify intent,

and basically all those
insights are now being used

to create intelligent
agents and chat bots.
With Post Call Analytics,

we've been able to process
about one million calls.
We've got a vision that it is basically
following a responsible AI principle.

We have to be compliant
with the regulator.

And we found that within
transcribed call analytics,
we may get that.

Not only the transcriptions,
but also the redaction

and the obfuscation
combined with comprehend.

So basically it's everything
in just one single component.

Prescriptions plus data mining,
redaction and obfuscation.
And we believe that that's unique for AWS.

We are always looking to
have the human in the loop.
So far, all the GenAI-related initiatives

that we've got are requiring
human intervention.
With those two elements right now,

we are able to improve
the customer experience,

but also improve our
engagement center operations.
(bright upbeat music)
